description: Enable seamless interaction with the Velt API through a dedicated MCP server. Integrate Velt's capabilities directly into your tools to enhance productivity and automation. Simplify API access and management within your development environment.

capabilities.name: get-organizations
capabilities.description: Get organizations from Velt. See velt://docs/organizations/get-organizations for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: add-organizations
capabilities.description: Add organizations to Velt. See velt://docs/organizations/add-organizations for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: update-organizations
capabilities.description: Update organizations in Velt. See velt://docs/organizations/update-organizations for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: delete-organizations
capabilities.description: Delete organizations from Velt. This will permanently remove organizations and all associated data. See velt://docs/organizations/delete-organizations for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: execute-delete-organizations
capabilities.description: Execute the deletion of organizations from Velt after confirmation. This should only be called after the user has confirmed they want to proceed with the deletion. See velt://docs/organizations/delete-organizations for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: update-disable-state-for-organizations
capabilities.description: Update disable state for organizations in Velt. See velt://docs/organizations/update-organization-disable-state for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: add-organization-user-groups
capabilities.description: Add organization user groups to Velt. See velt://docs/organization-user-groups/add-groups for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: add-users-to-organization-user-group
capabilities.description: Add users to organization user groups in Velt. See velt://docs/organization-user-groups/add-users-to-group for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: delete-users-from-organization-user-group
capabilities.description: Delete users from organization user groups in Velt. When deleteAll is true, this will remove ALL users from the group. See velt://docs/organization-user-groups/delete-users-from-group for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: execute-delete-all-users-from-organization-user-group
capabilities.description: Execute the deletion of ALL users from an organization user group after confirmation. This should only be called after the user has confirmed they want to proceed with the deletion. See velt://docs/organization-user-groups/delete-users-from-group for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: update-documents
capabilities.description: Update documents in Velt. See velt://docs/documents/update-documents for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: delete-documents
capabilities.description: Delete documents from Velt. This will permanently remove documents and all associated collaboration data. See velt://docs/documents/delete-documents for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: execute-delete-documents
capabilities.description: Execute the deletion of documents from Velt after confirmation. This should only be called after the user has confirmed they want to proceed with the deletion. See velt://docs/documents/delete-documents for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: update-document-access
capabilities.description: Update document access in Velt. See velt://docs/documents/update-document-access for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: update-document-disabled-state
capabilities.description: Update document disabled state in Velt. See velt://docs/documents/update-document-disable-state for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: get-comment-annotations
capabilities.description: Get comment annotations from Velt. See velt://docs/comments/get-comment-annotations for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: get-comment-annotations-count
capabilities.description: Get count of comment annotations from Velt. See velt://docs/comments/get-comment-annotations-count for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: add-comment-annotations
capabilities.description: Add comment annotations to Velt. See velt://docs/comments/add-comment-annotations for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: update-comment-annotations
capabilities.description: Update comment annotations in Velt. See velt://docs/comments/update-comment-annotations for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: delete-comment-annotations
capabilities.description: Delete comment annotations from Velt. See velt://docs/comments/delete-comment-annotations for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: add-comments
capabilities.description: Add comments to Velt. See velt://docs/comments/add-comments for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: update-comments
capabilities.description: Update comments in Velt. See velt://docs/comments/update-comments for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: delete-comments
capabilities.description: Delete comments from Velt. See velt://docs/comments/delete-comments for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: get-comments

capabilities.name: get-users
capabilities.description: Get users from Velt. See velt://docs/users/get-users for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: add-users
capabilities.description: Add users to Velt. See velt://docs/users/add-users for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: update-users
capabilities.description: Update users in Velt. See velt://docs/users/update-users for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: delete-users
capabilities.description: Delete users from Velt. See velt://docs/users/delete-users for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: delete-all-user-data-gdpr
capabilities.description: Delete all user data from Velt (GDPR compliance). This will permanently remove all user data including comments, reactions, recordings, and notifications. This action cannot be undone. See velt://docs/users/delete-all-user-data-gdpr for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: execute-delete-all-user-data-gdpr
capabilities.description: Execute the deletion of all user data from Velt (GDPR compliance) after confirmation. This should only be called after the user has confirmed they want to proceed with the deletion. See velt://docs/users/delete-all-user-data-gdpr for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: get-all-user-data-gdpr
capabilities.description: Get all user data stored in Velt for GDPR compliance. This includes profile data, comments, reactions, notifications, and recordings. See velt://docs/users/get-all-user-data-gdpr for detailed documentation.

capabilities.name: get-delete-user-data-status-gdpr
capabilities.description: Get the status of a user data deletion process for GDPR compliance. Use the jobId returned from the delete-all-user-data-gdpr API. See velt://docs/users/get-delete-user-data-status-gdpr for detailed documentation.
